an5.213:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno pamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahatiṁ bhogajāniṁ nigacchati.
an5.213:1.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:2.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlassa sīlavipannassa pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:2.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:3.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ, yadi gahapatiparisaṁ, yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—avisārado upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto.
an5.213:3.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:4.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno sammūḷho kālaṁ karoti.
an5.213:4.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:5.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, dussīlo sīlavipanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
an5.213:5.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ādīnavo dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā.
an5.213:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno appamādādhikaraṇaṁ mahantaṁ bhogakkhandhaṁ adhigacchati.
an5.213:6.4: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:7.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavato sīlasampannassa kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
an5.213:7.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:8.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno yaññadeva parisaṁ upasaṅkamati—yadi khattiyaparisaṁ, yadi brāhmaṇaparisaṁ, yadi gahapatiparisaṁ, yadi samaṇaparisaṁ—visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto.
an5.213:8.2: Ayaṁ bhikkhave, tatiyo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:9.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno asammūḷho kālaṁ karoti.
an5.213:9.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:10.1: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, sīlavā sīlasampanno kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
an5.213:10.2: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, pañcamo ānisaṁso sīlavato sīlasampadāya.
an5.213:10.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṁsā sīlavato sīlasampadāyā”ti.
